thread.title: Netflix has 25 new originals set for release in April – here’s the full list
thread.title_full: Netflix has 25 new originals set for release in April – here’s the full list

author: Zach Epstein
title: Netflix has 25 new originals set for release in April – here’s the full list
text:
Netflix has been on quite the roll lately, and it all led up to the company's release earlier this week of the hotly anticipated stand-up special from Dave Chappelle. The legendary comedian came out of semi-retirement to release the first two installments from his series of Netflix specials. According to reports from late last year, Chappelle will earn $60 million from his Netflix deal. It's a remarkable sum indeed, but it's a drop in the bucket for Netflix, which continues to invest heavily in original content to separate itself from network television and from other streaming rivals such as Amazon and Hulu.
The streaming media giant has seen great success with its strategy thus far, and Netflix has no plans to slow down. In fact, Netflix is releasing a whopping 25 original titles next month alone, and we've laid them all out for you here along with their release dates.
Continue reading...
